description:
Revision to almost everything and other than maybe the ending harmony may be complete for good.

Tempo for first riff increased to give illusion of faster main riff. drum beats corrected to be quarter instead of eighth notes. Bass changed slightly in all places to use A string more and less "boring" verse is the only thing heavily changed. solo slightly different at the end. Bass harmony buildup different. Drums changed right before verse and bass lost one note. Bridge changed on guitar and bass. 3rd verse easier to play on bass stretch.

description:
Bass: Changed the 3rd pre-chorus to follow the double bass, ending harmony has some chords now bridge now follows drums until the cymbal comes in then back to the guitar. Bass should be completely done now
Some drum errors fixed like 3 hands mistakes or odd snare placement big error in chorus: hi hat changed because it was missing a hi hat beat on every measure
Bridge hi hat changed to ride (may revert if it doesn't sound good)
Guitars exactly the same except the last buildup which has the harmony guitars ring longer.

description:
THE FIRST COMPLETE VERSION (excluding vocals)
It's finally done there may be a new revision if I ever find an error but the tab and structure itself are complete for all parts. Now I will work on a real life demo with just guitar and bass

CHANGES:
Solo ending finalized some transitions may sound weird but In real life they are normal.
Bass/Guitar solo rhythm finalized and new ending. A new pause measure added in the solo rhythm too
Drums now come in for first pre-chorus and are in the post solo
Harmony note placement much easier to play in real life and extra guitar and rhythm flipped in some places.
Harmony Climb less dissonant and half bend gone in solo intro.
Added a few new buildup bars at the very end of song
Harmony added to ending
title: Useless

description:
Added parts all the way up to the solo.
RHYTHM GUITAR: no changes other than adding more
LEAD GUITAR: made it act more like a dual tracked guitar
EXTRA GUITAR: new and handles harmonies
BASS GUITAR: removed most slides in intro, heavily modified verse and added slide into verse. Chorus and bridge are tabbed but haven't been changed to be different than the guitar yet.
VOCALS: now indicate when singing would occur but still no real parts beside the chorus
DRUMS: modified end of verse and added a cymbal ending to the main riff entrance.

ending will be complete tomorrow solo may take longer.
title: Useless
